iti111:3.1: viharataṃ → bhavataṃ (sya-all) | kimassa uttari karaṇīyaṃ → kissa bhikkhave uttariṃ karaṇīyaṃ (bj); kimassa bhikkhave uttari karaṇīyaṃ (sya-all); kiñcassa bhikkhave uttari karaṇīyaṃ (pts-vp-pli1)
iti111:4.1: abhijjhā, byāpādo vigato → abhijjhā vigatā hoti, byāpādo vigato hoti (si, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed, csp1ed) 15A4:86 | thinamiddhaṃ vigataṃ hoti, uddhaccakukkuccaṃ vigataṃ hoti, vicikicchā → thinamiddhaṃ uddhaccakukkuccaṃ vicikicchā (15A4:86) | asammuṭṭhā → appamuṭṭhā (sya-all)
